item.title: Roblox will require all users to perform age-checks to access chat from January
item.description: Starting Tuesday, users can voluntarily undergo the age-check process to secure access to communication features.

item.title: Social Security Data Is Openly Being Shared With DHS to Target Immigrants
item.description: For months, the Social Security Administration was quietly sharing sensitive data about immigrants with DHS. Now it’s official.
